name: TF_PLAY_GAME_EVERYCLASS
description: Play a complete round with every class.

name: TF_PLAY_GAME_EVERYMAP
description: Play a complete game on 2Fort, Dustbowl, Granary, Gravel Pit, Hydro, and Well (CP).

description: Set five enemies on fire in 30 seconds.

name: TF_GET_HEADSHOTS

name: TF_MEDIC_TOP_SCOREBOARD

name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_UNDER_FIRE

name: TF_MEDIC_COUNTER_CHARGE

name: TF_MVM_MAPS_MANNHATTAN_NO_GATES
description: Play an advanced mission without losing a single gate in Mannhattan.

name: TF_MVM_MAPS_MANNHATTAN_STUN_RADIOWAVE
description: As a team, kill 50 stunned radiowave robots in an advanced mission in Mannhattan.

name: TF_MVM_MAPS_MANNHATTAN_BOMB_BOT_GRIND
description: Kill 500 gate crashing robots in Mannhattan.

name: TF_MVM_SENTRY_BUSTER_FRIENDLY_FIRE
description: Kill 5 robots in a single explosion from detonating a sentry buster.

name: TF_MVM_MAPS_ROTTENBURG_PIT_GRIND
description: Pit 100 enemies in Rottenburg.

name: TF_MVM_SNIPER_COLLECT_HEADSHOT_MONEY
description: As a Sniper collect $500 in a mission without running over the currency packs.

name: TF_MVM_MEDIC_SHIELD_BLOCK_DAMAGE
description: Block 5,000 damage with the shield as a Medic in a single life.

name: TF_MVM_MEDIC_REVIVE_TEAMMATES
description: Use one ÜberCharge to quickly revive 2 teammates within 5 seconds.

name: TF_MVM_ROCKET_SPECIALIST_KILL_GRIND
description: Kill 5 enemies with a single rocket while upgraded with rocket specialist.

name: TF_MVM_ROCKET_SPECIALIST_STUN_GRIND
description: Stun 50 robots while upgraded with rocket specialist.

name: TF_PARACHUTE_KILL_GRIND
description: Kill 10 parachuting players.

name: TF_MELEE_KILL_CLASSIC_RIFLE_SNIPER
description: Melee kill 10 Snipers using The Classic.

name: TF_KILL_CHARGING_DEMO
description: Kill a charging Demoman.

name: TF_SCOUT_BACKSCATTER_KILL_SPY_GRIND
description: While using the Back Scatter, kill 20 spies from behind.

name: TF_SCOUT_BACKSCATTER_KILL_HEAVY_MEDIC_PAIR
description: While using the Back Scatter, kill a Heavy/Medic pair within 20 seconds of each other.

name: TF_SCOUT_BACKSCATTER_KILL_FRIENDS_GRIND
description: While using the Back Scatter, kill 20 friends from behind.

name: TF_SNIPER_CLASSIC_RIFLE_NOSCOPE_HEADSHOT
description: While using The Classic, kill 10 enemies with a full charge, no-scope headshot.

name: TF_SNIPER_CLASSIC_RIFLE_HEADSHOT_JUMPER
description: While using The Classic, kill a rocket/grenade jumping enemy in midair with a full charge, no-scope headshot.

name: TF_SNIPER_CLASSIC_RIFLE_GIB_GRIND
description: While using The Classic, gib all 9 classes during a single round.

name: TF_SOLDIER_PARACHUTE_KILL_GROUP
description: Kill 3 players during the same parachute deploy.

name: TF_SOLDIER_PARACHUTE_DISTANCE
description: Parachute 19.47 miles.

name: TF_SOLDIER_PARACHUTE_KILL_PARACHUTE
description: Kill a parachuting player while parachuting.

name: TF_DEMOMAN_PARACHUTE_KILL_GROUP
description: Kill 3 players during the same parachute deploy.

name: TF_DEMOMAN_PARACHUTE_DISTANCE
description: Parachute 19.47 miles.

name: TF_DEMOMAN_PARACHUTE_KILL_PARACHUTE
description: Kill a parachuting player while parachuting.

name: TF_DEMOMAN_KILL_PLAYER_YOU_DIDNT_SEE
description: Kill an enemy that you couldn't see at the beginning of your charge.

name: TF_DEMOMAN_QUICK_KILLS
description: Get 3 kills within 6 seconds using the Demoman charge.

name: TF_DEMOMAN_CHARGE_KILL_CHARGING_DEMO
description: Kill a charging Demoman while charging.

name: TF_SPY_KILL_BACKSCATTER_SCOUT
description: Backstab a Scout that is using the Back Scatter.

name: TF_SOLDIER_AIRSTRIKE_MAX_CLIP
description: Collect enough casualties to get the max clip for the Air Strike.

name: TF_SOLDIER_AIRSTRIKE_GROUP_KILL
description: Kill 3 people with the Air Strike during a single rocket jump.

name: TF_SNIPER_PARACHUTE_GRIND
description: Kill 25 parachuting players with a critical headshot.

name: TF_TAUNT_CONGA_KILL
description: Kill 3 players who are doing the Conga within 5 seconds.

name: TF_TAUNT_CONGA_LINE
description: Do the Conga with 10 or more players at the same time.

name: TF_TAUNT_RPS_ROCK
description: Lose at Rock, Paper, Scissors 3 times in a row with Rock.

name: TF_TAUNT_RPS_SCISSORS
description: Win at Rock, Paper, Scissors 3 times in a row with Scissors.

name: TF_TAUNT_DOSIDO_MELLE_KILL
description: Melee kill 10 players while they are doing the Square Dance taunt.

name: TF_TAUNT_WHILE_CAPPING
description: Do 10 partner taunts with a teammate while capturing a control point.

name: TF_PYRO_IGNITE_PLAYER_BEING_FLIPPED
description: Ignite a player that is being flipped by someone using the Flippin' Awesome taunt.

name: TF_HALLOWEEN_DOOMSDAY_KILL_KARTS
description: Kill 30 enemies by bumping their bumper cars off the tracks.

name: TF_HALLOWEEN_DOOMSDAY_COLLECT_DUCKS
displayName: Carnival of Carnage: Up All Night To Get Ducky
description: Collect 250 ducks.

name: TF_HALLOWEEN_DOOMSDAY_SCORE_GOALS
description: Score 3 goals in bumper car soccer.

name: TF_HALLOWEEN_DOOMSDAY_RESPAWN_TEAMMATES
description: Respawn 30 ghost teammates during bumper car games.

name: TF_HALLOWEEN_DOOMSDAY_TINY_SMASHER
description: Kill 15 enemies while under the effect of Merasmus's melee-only curse.

name: TF_HALLOWEEN_DOOMSDAY_MILESTONE
displayName: Carnival of Carnage: Step Right Up
description: Earn 4 of the Carnival of Carnage achievements.

name: TF_HALLOWEEN_DOOMSDAY_WIN_MINIGAMES
displayName: Carnival of Carnage: Bumper to Bumper to Bumper
description: Win each of the 3 bumper car games to earn a bonus Halloween Gift Cauldron.

name: TF_MAPS_POWERHOUSE_WIN_ROUNDS
description: Win 142 Rounds.

name: TF_MAPS_POWERHOUSE_PUSH_BACK_AND_WIN
description: Win a round in which the enemy team has attempted to capture your final control point.

name: TF_MAPS_POWERHOUSE_FAST_FINAL_CAP
description: Capture the final control point within 15 seconds of your team capturing the previous control point.

name: TF_MAPS_POWERHOUSE_KILL_CAPPING_PLAYER
description: Kill 15 enemies while they are capturing a point.

name: TF_MAPS_POWERHOUSE_KILL_ENEMY_IN_WATER
description: Kill five enemies while they are in the water.

name: TF_PASS_TIME_HAT
description: Reveal the mystery of the PASS Time TV Room.

name: TF_PASS_TIME_GRIND
description: Win 10 rounds playing PASS Time.
